description:
Yozakura Shion is the second daughter and the fourth sibling of the 10th generation of the Yozakura Family. Shion has short, pink hair with bangs that fall down to her eyes, which are also pink. She`s of average height, with fair-light skin. She also typically has some sort of candy in her mouth. She is usually seen wearing long loose-fitting shirts, that often end up revealing a shoulder. Her shirts often have a symbol on the front like a star or lightning bolt.
Source: Mission: Yozakura Family Wiki
name: Yozakura Shion
